title: My PBE Status - Something Went Wrong!
body: I think i was accepted to test in the _PBE_ but I cant create an account for it because it gives me said error! Is the page under maintenance? Is it currently working for others?

replies.body: I went ahead and looked into your account's PBE state. It looks like we did receive your application, but this account hasn't been accepted into PBE quite yet. Keep checking your e-mail for acceptance!
The PBE status and sign up pages are _not working_ It says there is an Error 500. I think that is what he was asking about.
